source:
TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_00<tab>Lisette has an important announcement to share with one and all.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_00<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.<var 1A 01 /var>

Lisette est prête à vous annoncer le résultat final du vote.

source:
TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_01<tab>Lisette cheerily explains to you that the votes have been all but counted, and announces that the winner of the contest is none other than Bert. She bids you accompany Bert as an unbiased observer, such that you might render a sound decision on her behalf. Bert then instructs you to wait just beyond his arranged meeting spot with your masked client.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_01<tab>Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Lisette vous a annoncé que Bert avait remporté la majorité des suffrages. Vous avez ensuite accepté d'aller observer l'apprenti messager de l'amour pour juger s'il allait ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment parvenir à soigner les peines de cœur du mystérieux jeune homme. Rendez-vous à la guilde des menuisiers, à Nouvelle Gridania, et attendez à l'endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_02<tab>You accompany Bert─newly minted as this year's emissary of love─to visit your heretofore masked client, who reveals himself to be none other than Guildmaster Ywain of Lancers' Guild fame. Though somewhat skeptical, Ywain humors Bert's suggestion to take up woodworking, and the two of them make their way to the Carpenters' Guild where they are greeted by a skeptical Guildmaster Beatin. The ever-serious soldier stutters that he has come seeking a better understanding of love─a confession which Beatin, as is his wont, egregiously mishears and misinterprets as a desire to deeply understand <var 1A 02 /var>lumber<var 1A 01 /var>. Convinced that he has found a kindred spirit in his fellow guildmaster, Beatin whisks Ywain off to the depths of the Twelveswood, that they might bond over their newfound shared passion for the wonderful world of wood.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez assisté à l'entrevue entre Bert et le Gridanien langoureux, qui n'était autre qu'Ywain. Ils se sont ensuite rendus à la guilde des menuisiers, ou ce dernier a fait une rencontre pour le moins étrange avec un Beatin aussi enthousiaste qu'à son habitude. Parlez à Bert, à la guilde des menuisiers.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_03<tab>His mission to find a passionate encounter for Ywain complete—at least, in the most charitable sense of the word—Bert eagerly suggests that you both return to Lady Lisette to deliver word of his triumph.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez parlé à Bert, qui estime avoir rempli sa mission avec brio. Retournez à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto pour faire part de vos impressions à Lisette.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_04<tab>Upon your return, Lady Lisette carefully weighs the events of the day. Though not entirely convinced at the outset, after asking your thoughts and reconsidering the matter for herself, she triumphantly declares Bert's trial a success. The passionate young man rejoices, and with her Lady Lisette's blessing, the newly crowned emissary of love steps confidently into his role as master of ceremonies for this year's Valentione's Day. Your own duty done as well, you are free to enjoy the festivities as you see fit before going forth and returning to your adventures.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SEQ_04<tab>Après avoir entendu votre témoignage, Lisette a estimé que Bert avait mérité d'être nommé messager de l'amour en chef pour cette édition de la Valention. La fête ne fait que commencer, donc profitez-en pour vous amuser avec <var 1A 02 /var>ardeur et affection<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_TODO_00<tab>Wait for your client outside the Carpenters' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_TODO_00<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué, près de la guilde des menuisiers

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Bert.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Bert

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Bert at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you cannot have either of the quests “Astrid's Acumen” or “Rodrigault's Revelation” in progress.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Vous ne pouvez pas accepter cette quête si vous avez déjà commencé les quêtes “Le défi d'Astrid” ou “Le défi de Rodrigault”.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't my most beloved of adventurers! You've picked the perfect time to come. Why's that, you say? Why, I was just about to announce the results of the contest and name this year's new emissary of love!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Ma chère)) ((Mon cher)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous attendais<var 1D /var>!♪ Le vote est terminé, et je suis en mesure de vous communiquer le résultat final<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_001<tab>So without further ado... Ladies and gentlemen, the votes have been counted, and the winner is...Bert, and his proposal that our yearning youth, er...take up woodworking!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_001<tab>Le messager de l'amour qui a obtenu le plus de suffrages est...



... Bert<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_002<tab>A very...<var 1A 02 /var>creative<var 1A 01 /var> solution, to be sure. That said, from the moment you told me that Bert's proposal had your support, I had a feeling that somehow he would emerge the victor.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_002<tab>Je reconnais bien là mon <var 08 E905 ((aventurière préférée)) ((aventurier préféré)) /var>. Vous aviez brillamment deviné qui allait remporter la victoire, bravo<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_003<tab>I realize that Bert was not your first choice─to be quite honest, nor was he mine─but I do hope you will be so kind as to support him in his endeavors.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_003<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, vous n'aviez pas deviné qui allait remporter la victoire. Mais peu importe, je compte sur vous pour encourager Bert, désormais<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_007<tab>And wouldn't you know it...there he is right now! Bert! Oh, Bert!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_007<tab>Oh, regardez qui voilà<var 1D /var>! C'est notre heureux vainqueur<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_008<tab>Oho! If it isn't the insightful adventurer who was the first to throw <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> support my way! To the surprise of neither of us, I'm sure, Bert the Beloved's flawless proposal has carried the day!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_008<tab>Ha ha<var 1D /var>! Comme prévu, je n'ai pas laissé la moindre chance à mes adversaires<var 1D /var>! Encore merci d'avoir voté pour moi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_009<tab>Oho! Color me entirely unsurprised, for Bert the Beloved's flawless proposal has carried the day! Don't beat yourself up too much for supporting one of my vanquished foes, friend. I still welcome your assistance in any way you'd care to give it!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_009<tab>Ha ha<var 1D /var>! Comme prévu, je n'ai pas laissé la moindre chance à mes adversaires<var 1D /var>! Je t'avais pourtant <var 08 E905 ((prévenue)) ((prévenu)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_010<tab>As our newly nominated emissary of love, Bert will now go proudly forth and put his, er, rather bold proposal into action, that one more soul in this realm may find the true love and happiness they so deeply deserve.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_010<tab>À partir de maintenant, Bert va mettre en pratique la solution qu'il a imaginée pour soigner les peines de cœur de notre Gridanien langoureux. Et lui permettre, qui sait, de rencontrer l'âme sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_011<tab>On this momentous occasion, I would ask of you a special favor. Would you be so kind as to accompany my associate on his adventure of the heart, that you might witness firsthand the passion of his words and judge the efficacy of his actions?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'aimerais que vous soyez témoin de ce qui va se passer. Vous allez observer dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment comment s'en sort mon apprenti messager de l'amour, et juger de la réussite ou non du défi qui lui est proposé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_012<tab>Under different circumstances, I would perform the task myself, but given my own preconceptions about the man, I fear it may be difficult for me to remain an impartial observer. You will humor me this time, will you not?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_012<tab>En temps normal, je me serais fait mon propre avis, mais je connais trop bien Bert pour l'évaluer objectivement. Une fois de plus, je préfère m'en remettre à votre opinion impartiale<var 1D /var>! Pourriez-vous faire cela pour moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_013<tab>I have already reached out to our client, and he has agreed to meet me at the Carpenters' Guild. Clearly, he is as eager to see my plan come to fruition as I am!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_013<tab>Comme j'aime pas tergiverser, j'ai déjà donné rendez-vous à notre homme près de la guilde des menuisiers. Il a sûrement hâte que je m'occupe de son cas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_014<tab>You are welcome to a front row seat at my certain-to-be-masterful performance as well. Just promise that you will not get <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> close. You wouldn't want to upstage the star of the show, of course. Now, come along!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_014<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je compte sur toi pour ne pas perdre une seule miette de ma brillante performance. Mais essaye de pas te faire remarquer, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_015<tab>Will Bert's bold-faced plan succeed in bringing the succor of love to a young man's heart? Why, my heart flutters in anticipation! Pray watch over my associate from close by, that you might report back to me regarding all you have seen.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_015<tab>J'aimerais que vous alliez observer dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment comment s'en sort Bert avec notre jeune homme en mal de rencontres, et que vous jugiez de la réussite ou non du défi qui lui est proposé. Je compte sur vous<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_020<tab>(-Pining Gridanian-)My apologies. I hope I have not kept you waiting overlong.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_020<tab>(-Gridanien langoureux-)Désolé pour l'attente.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_021<tab>Oho! So our mysterious masked client finally removes his cover! And you would be...?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_021<tab>Ah, tu as enfin décidé de tomber le masque.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_022<tab>Ywain, Guildmaster of the Lancers' Guild. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_022<tab>Oui. Je suis Ywain, chef de la guilde des maîtres d'hast.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_023<tab>A pleasure, indeed! And I am Bert the Beloved, aspiring emissary of love and the hero who has come to help you tap into your true passion and claim the love you so clearly deserve! And now, allow me to elaborate on how we will do precisely that!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_023<tab>Enchanté, moi c'est Bert, ardent messager de l'amour à ton service<var 1D /var>! Voilà ce qu'on va faire pour régler ton problème...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_024<tab>Take up a hobby, you say? Well, I do suppose that might afford me the chance to meet new people... But what manner of pastime would you propose?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_024<tab>Trouver un nouveau passe-temps, tu dis<var 1D /var>? Euh, pourquoi pas... Mais quoi, par exemple<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_025<tab>My good man, I thought you'd never ask! Take a look around you─do you not see where we now stand?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_025<tab>C'est évident, enfin<var 1D /var>! Quoi de mieux que la menuiserie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_026<tab>The Carpenters' Guild? Do you mean to suggest I should take up...woodworking?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_026<tab>... En voilà une drôle d'idée<var 1D /var>! Et pourquoi la menuiserie...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_027<tab>You've hit the nail straight on the head! What else <var 1A 02 /var>but<var 1A 01 /var> woodworking? Not only is it a most virile and masculine activity fitting your ample physical prowess, it is sure to charm any lady searching for a man who pulls his weight around the house!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_027<tab>Parce que tout le monde aime avoir un homme qui touche sa bille en bricolage à la maison<var 1D /var>! Imagine un peu, tu pourras apprendre à fabriquer de quoi meubler au poil ton intérieur... mais aussi créer tes propres armes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_028<tab>Hmm. I cannot believe I am saying this, but...you may very well have a point.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_028<tab>En effet, vu comme ça...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_029<tab>But of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> I do! You'll be pleased to know that I've already worked out the details of your apprenticeship with Master Beatin. All you need do is stride through those doors, declare your arrival, and you'll be hammering and sawing in no time!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_029<tab>Et devine quoi, c'est justement pour ça que je t'ai donné rendez-vous ici<var 1D /var>! J'ai déjà prévenu Beatin, le maître de la guilde des menuisiers, et il est prêt à nous recevoir. Allons-y<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_030<tab>Master Beatin! It is I, Bert the Beloved, come with the new apprentice I promised you!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_030<tab>Rebonjour, Beatin<var 1D /var>! Voici l'homme dont je t'ai parlé.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_031<tab>Yes, yes...no doubt another wide-eyed young fool who doesn't know a hatchet from a─Guildmaster Ywain!? <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> are my new pupil?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_031<tab>... Ywain, c'est toi<var 1D /var>!? Ça alors, pour une surprise...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_032<tab>What in the Twelve's name are you thinking? Did you get bopped on the head by the butt of a lance? I'm a busy man. I don't have time to entertain wayward warriors who want to play at woodworking...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_032<tab>Dis-moi, que me vaut la visite du chef de la guilde des maîtres d'hast<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_033<tab>I...I assure you, Master Beatin, that I am quite serious about this endeavor.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_033<tab>Eh bien... Comment dire...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_034<tab>For I am...how shall I say it? Looking to better understand love, er...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_034<tab>Je suis ici pour... trouver l'amour...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_035<tab>Eh, what's that you say? Looking to understand lumber...?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_035<tab>... Comment<var 1D /var>!? Tu es venu pour <var 1A 02 /var>donner<var 1A 01 /var> de l'amour<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_036<tab>Could it truly be? Have I misjudged you all these years? Here, I thought you a thick-headed warrior, when in fact you were a sensitive soul! A kindred spirit who marvels at the majesty of oak─revels in the resilience of rosewood...!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_036<tab>Hé hé hé... Mon cher Ywain, tu veux dire que ta passion pour la beauté du bois vient de s'éveiller<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_037<tab>Ah, forgive me, Master Beatin. It appears you misheard him. What Master Ywain's actually looking for is─
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_037<tab>Euh, non... Ce qu'Ywain essaye de dire, c'est que...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_038<tab>Well, why didn't you say so sooner, my boy!? My fellow guildmaster, a man after my own heart! Come, and I shall teach you to become one with the wood! To know every nook and cranny of every tree in the Twelveswood!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_038<tab>Cela fait tant d'années que je mets tout mon amour dans chacune des armes que je fabrique pour ta guilde... Quelle joie de voir que mon enthousiasme a enfin trouvé écho en toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_039<tab>Yes, when I am through with you─and mind you, I will not rest until I have imparted <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> of my knowledge─you will understand the mighty trees from which your precious weapons are crafted as well─nay, better!─than you know how to wield them!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_039<tab>Alors, dis-moi tout<var 1D /var>! Ton espèce d'arbre favorite, les courbes de nervures que tu préfères... Et le meilleur vernis, au toucher<var 1D /var>? Nous avons tant à partager<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_040<tab>I... I thank you, Master Beatin, but that was not quite what I had in─
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_YWAIN_000_040<tab>Mais non, enfin<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas du tout ce que...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_041<tab>Be not shy or afraid, my boy! The trees of the Twelveswood welcome you with open arms!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_041<tab>Bien sûr, je peux tout à fait comprendre que tu n'aies pas envie de partager des choses aussi intimes ici... Allons plutôt discuter de tout ça dehors, en admirant nos amis les arbres.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_042<tab>Now come this way, my compatriot in carpentry... The wondrous world of all that is wood awaits you!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BEATINE_000_042<tab>Viens avec moi, ça va être passionnant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_050<tab>I had heard the rumors of Master Beatin's boundless enthusiasm, but I must admit that turn of events caught me somewhat by surprise...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_050<tab>Ils sont partis tous les deux... Je dois t'avouer que même moi, j'étais com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment bouche bée devant l'enthousiasme démesuré de Beatin, et j'ai été incapable de venir en aide à notre pauvre Ywain.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_051<tab>Why, I daresay the man's sheer passion nigh outstrips my own! At least when it comes to wood, that is. I do hope Guildmaster Ywain was not too overwhelmed.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_051<tab>Enfin “pauvre”, c'est vite dit... Peut-être que ces deux-là vont s'entendre comme larrons en foire, qui sait<var 1D /var>? Après tout, c'est bien pour faire des rencontres qu'Ywain a frappé à notre porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_052<tab>Still, our man was looking for an encounter full of ardor and affection, and he has certainly found one! For who is to say the man's meeting must involve the fairer sex? Man, woman, wood...in matters of the heart, I daresay the difference is immaterial.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_052<tab>Du coup, on peut dire que mon petit plan est une parfaite réussite, non<var 1D /var>? J'ai conseillé un nouveau passe-temps à Ywain, et il aura pas mis bien longtemps à rencontrer quelqu'un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_053<tab>At any rate, Lady Lisette is surely beside herself waiting to hear word of my inevitable rousing success. Let us go together and share the triumphant tidings!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_053<tab>Bon, je vais aller retrouver Lisette pour lui dire que tout s'est passé exactement comme je l'avais prévu. Je compte sur toi pour nous rejoindre et témoigner de mon magnifique succès<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_054<tab>I do hope Bert's plan succeeded to our client's satisfaction. Why, I simply couldn't forgive myself if I allowed that overbearing fool to tarnish the good name of House Valentione...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_054<tab>Alors<var 1D /var>? Vous qui avez tout vu de vos propres yeux, qu'avez-vous pensé du plan de Bert<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_100_060<tab>You arrive at last, my friend! Rest assured that I have shared with Lady Lisette all the details of Ywain's encounter with Master Beatin. No doubt it is but a matter of moments until she declares my effort a resounding success.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_100_060<tab>Voilà, j'ai tout raconté à Lisette<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, il te reste plus qu'à lui confirmer que mon plan a bel et bien réussi...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_060<tab>Welcome back, my beloved friend! Bert has told me everything. To be perfectly honest with you, that was not precisely─or to be honest, not <var 1A 02 /var>at all<var 1A 01 /var> how I had envisioned everything working out...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_060<tab>Bert m'a expliqué ce qui s'est passé dans les moindres détails<var 1D /var>!♪ <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'aimerais savoir ce que vous pensez de la situation avant de rendre mon verdict.

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_061<tab>...Which is why I seek your opinion as one who has served me loyally in the name of love. What say you? Was Bert's unusual approach worthy of the title of emissary of ardor?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_061<tab>D'après vous, Bert a-t-il été capable de trouver la solution aux maux de notre Gridanien langoureux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_001<tab>That depends on the two of them...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_001<tab>Ça va dépendre d'Ywain et Beatin...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_002<tab>It's a start, is it not?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_002<tab>Il aura au moins fait une rencontre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_003<tab>There <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> many types of love...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_A1_000_003<tab>Disons que l'amour a de nombreux visages...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_062<tab>I suppose you are right. Their relationship now might simply be one of master and student, but when two men bond over a love of wood, who knows what sparks might fly, and what passions may yet be kindled?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_062<tab>Vous avez raison. Même s'il ne s'agit encore que d'une relation de maître et d'élève, qui sait jusqu'où la flamme de la passion pourra les mener<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_063<tab>Indeed it is. After all, until today poor Ywain scarcely spoke with anyone but stoic soldiers not unlike himself. Now, he has found a kindred spirit with whom he might bond over a love for the natural world around him. Who am I─or anyone─to say where this might lead?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_063<tab>En effet, il se plaignait avant tout de ne jamais faire de rencontres amoureuses. Je ne sais pas si c'est le début d'une relation, mais on peut dire qu'il y a du progrès, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_064<tab>Do you mean to say that our friend Ywain might, like Master Beatin, find his love for trees transcends all? I am not certain that is the sort of ardor we should be encouraging, but still...I suppose a passion for wood is better than no passion at all.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_064<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>? Un homme amoureux <var 1A 02 /var>des arbres<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!? Malgré ma grande expérience des histoires de cœur, je n'ai jamais entendu une chose pareille... Mais après tout, si Ywain le trouve à son goût, pourquoi pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_065<tab>At any rate, I do believe I have heard all I need to render my verdict. Hear me, Bert. By the powers invested in me by my forebears, I, Lisette de Valentione...
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_065<tab>Très bien, j'ai pris ma décision<var 1D /var>! Bert, en vertu des pouvoirs qui me sont conférés par mes ancêtres de la maison Valention...

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_066<tab>...Do hereby declare you a full-fledged emissary of ardor! Congratulations, my young associate! I can quite honestly say I never expected to see this day.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_066<tab>... je te nomme messager de l'amour en chef pour cette édition de la Valention<var 1D /var>! Fé<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_067<tab>And with that, I have no qualms whatsoever placing the full of this year's Valentione's Day proceedings under your charge.
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_067<tab>Comme convenu, c'est donc Bert qui assurera la direction des festivités. Je suis sûre qu'il saura s'acquitter de cette res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té avec <var 1A 02 /var>ardeur et affection<var 1A 01 /var>, comme le veut la tradition<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_068<tab>Well, Bert? How does it feel to rise to the occasion? Have you aught to say to the darling adventurer who helped make this occasion possible?
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_LISETTE_000_068<tab>Pour commencer, que dirais-tu de remercier notre <var 08 E905 ((amie aventurière)) ((ami aventurier)) /var>, sans qui tu n'aurais pu connaître cet honneur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_069<tab>Thank you, friend! I'd be lying if I said I couldn't have done it without you─the results were quite decisive, after all─but nevertheless I most appreciate you tagging along every─well, <var 1A 02 /var>almost<var 1A 01 /var> every step of the way to offer your support!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_069<tab>Merci du coup de main, l'<var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var><var 1D /var>! Si je suis là aujourd'hui, c'est aussi grâce à toi. On fait une bonne équipe, j'espère qu'on aura l'occasion de bosser ensemble à nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_070<tab>...And with that, if you'll excuse me, I do believe I have a job to do. You! Yes, you! Over there! Do you truly expect to find true love looking like <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!? Let Bert the Beloved show you how it's done and set you on a course for destiny!
target: TEXT_FESVLT606_03757_BERT_000_070<tab>En attendant, j'ai une Valention à faire tourner. Profite bien de la fête, car tu vas en avoir plein les yeux, foi de l'ardent messager de l'amour<var 1D /var>!
